t: Bestselling Arts, Crafts & Sewing Brands on Amazon.com in February ...
s: March 17, 2025 - In February 2025, Amazon.com's ... Arts, Crafts & Sewing category showcased 228 unique products from 153 different brands. Top brands among the bestsellers included Elmer's (6 products, 2.6% share), Apple Barrel (11 products, 4.8% share), and Kukka Essential Oils (2 products, 0.9% share). The prices of these bestselling products ranged from $0.58 to $44.99, with an average price of $9.67. Most bestsellers were priced in the $1-$10 range. ... A closer look at the top ...
